currentdescription: Design Drawing, Fabrication Supply Erection, Testing & Commissioning of   Fixed  wheel Type Vertical Lift Spillway Gate Tentative Size 10.80 M X 2.1M (36 Nos.) ,Under Sluice Gate Tentative Size 10.80M X2.56M (10Nos.= 6Nos. Right + 4Nos. Left), Head Regulator Gate Tentative Size 4.3 M X1.65M (07 Nos.= 5 Nos. Right +02 Nos. Left) Stop Log Gate Tentative Size 10.80M X 1.20M (20Nos.) For Under Sluice& Spillway Parts, and Stop Log Gate Tentative Size 4.30M X 1.00M (Left Head Regulator 02 Nos. & Right Head Regulator 02 Nos.) for Head Regulator Parts  with  Embedded Parts, Structural Steel Hoist Bridge and Platform, Gantry  crane with rail Track for barrage  as well as Head Regulator Portion , Structural Steel Trestle Consisting of Column (Box Type) approach Ladder Both Side for Barrage Portion and Each for Head Regulatorand Motorized Hoisting System  and Automation (SCADA for Multi Users) System at Kamla Barrage Site including the cost of Materials, Machinery, Labour, Annual repair and maintenance for 5 years(including 2 years of defect liability period) with all Complete job as per approved Drawing Specification of all Gates of Kamla Barrage Site under Kamla Canal Division Jaynagar , District Madhubani
